content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position (-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=-0.5) - extracting water, status: WORKING
- Boiler (position x=-5.0, y=2.5) - status: WORKING (refueled with coal in steps 121 and 124)
- Steam engine (position x=0.5, y=6.5) - status: WORKING
- Electric poles (positions x=4.5, y=6.5; x=0.5, y=8.5)
- Connected with pipes for water (system 3338) and steam (system 3341) transport

### Iron Mining and Smelting Area at position (15.5, 70.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill 1 (position x=15.5, y=70.5) - status: WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION (blockage cleared)
- Electric mining drill 2 (position x=18.5, y=70.5) - status: WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION (blockage cleared)
- Electric mining drill 3 (position x=21.5, y=70.5) - status: WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION (blockage cleared)
- Stone furnace 1 (position x=16.0, y=74.0) - contains coal and iron plates
- Stone furnace 2 (position x=19.0, y=74.0) - contains coal
- Stone furnace 3 (position x=22.0, y=74.0) - contains coal
- Inserters between drills and furnaces (positions x=15.5, y=72.5; x=18.5, y=72.5; x=21.5, y=72.5)
- Power poles (positions x=15.5, y=68.5; x=19.5, y=76.5; x=17.5, y=72.5; x=23.5, y=72.5; x=14.5, y=76.5)
- Output chest for iron plates (position x=19.5, y=77.5)
- Inserter for iron output (position x=16.5, y=76.5)

### Copper Mining and Smelting Area at position (-66.5, 75.5)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill 1 (position x=-66.5, y=75.5) - status: WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION (blockage cleared)
- Electric mining drill 2 (position x=-63.5, y=75.5) - status: WAITING_FOR_SPACE_IN_DESTINATION (blockage cleared)
- Stone furnace 1 (position x=-66.0, y=79.0) - contains coal
- Stone furnace 2 (position x=-63.0, y=79.0) - contains coal
- Inserters between drills and furnaces (positions x=-66.5, y=77.5; x=-63.5, y=77.5)
- Power poles (positions x=-64.5, y=81.5; x=-64.5, y=77.5; x=-64.5, y=73.5)
- Output chest for copper plates (position x=-64.5, y=82.5)

### Science Pack Assembly Area at position (-9.5, 57.5)
Consists of:
- Gear assembling machine (position x=-9.5, y=57.5) - set to produce iron gear wheels, status: ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE
- Science pack assembling machine (position x=-3.5, y=57.5) - set to produce automation science packs, status: ITEM_INGREDIENT_SHORTAGE
- Iron input chest (position x=-12.5, y=57.5) - contains iron plates
- Copper input chest (position x=-3.5, y=54.5) - contains 65 copper plates (increased from 50)
- Gear chest (position x=-6.5, y=56.5) - contains 4 automation science packs
- Science pack output chest (position x=-3.
